sourcesContent:
import "./post.css" import { MoreVert } from "@mui/icons-material" import {Users} from "../../dummyData" import { useState } from "react"; export default function post({post}) { const [like, setLike] = useState(post.like) let postUser = Users.find((y) => y.id === post.id); return (
{postUser.username} {post.date}
{post.desc}
{like} people like it
{post.comment}
) }
